Methods and Models Identification of Life Models for Li-Ion Batteries Using Penalized Regression and Bilevel Optimization NREL | 9 Automatic identification procedure 1. Bi-level (nested) optimization â€“ Local parameters correspond to unique behaviors of each cell â€“ Global parameters correspond to behaviors shared by all cells 2.
